Uses of TaskConfig in com.thoughtworks.go.plugin.api.task
 

Methods in com.thoughtworks.go.plugin.api.task that return TaskConfig
 TaskConfig Task.config()
          Specifies the configuration accepted and expected for the task.
 

Methods in com.thoughtworks.go.plugin.api.task with parameters of type TaskConfig
 ExecutionResult TaskExecutor.execute(TaskConfig config, TaskExecutionContext taskExecutionContext)
          The plugin infrastructure will call the execute() method, on the agent side, when the task needs to be run.
 ValidationResult Task.validate(TaskConfig configuration)
          Checks if a given task configuration is valid.
